snippet.title: Collagen Vascular Disease
snippet.description: * Collagen Vascular Disease Collagen Vascular Disease Collagen vascular disease refers to a group of diseases that affect your connective tissue. Collagen is a protein-based connective tissue that forms a support system for your skin. The connective tissue holds bones, ligaments,...
